com.whirvis.jraknet.chat.client

Class ChatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whirvis.jraknet.client.RakNetClient
      • com.whirvis.jraknet.chat.client.ChatClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RakNetClientListener, RakNetPeerMessenger

    public class ChatClient
extends RakNetClient
    A simple chat client built using JRakNet.
    Since:
    JRakNet v2.0.0
    Author:
    Trent Summerlin

                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Parameters:
        username - the new username.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the client is not connected to a server.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the username length is less than or equal 0.

        public void connect(java.net.InetSocketAddress address)
             throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                    java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                    RakNetException
        Description copied from class: RakNetClient
        Connects the client to a server.
        Overrides:
        connect in class RakNetClient
        Parameters:
        address - the address of the server to connect to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the address or the IP address of the address is null.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the client is currently connected to a server.
        RakNetException - if an error occurs during connection or login.

        client - the client.
